TopicTitle: Cygnus Manned Outpost - Developed for interplanetary and Munar footholds.

Articles.Content:
So, I present to you the Cygnus Manned Outpost. It is designed to be launched with a rover coupled to the docking port below it - that way when you get to your destination, you have the ability to send men on reconnaissance operations...Kethane mining, refueling, whatever the case may be. The docking port was spaced so that a DEMV Ant MK-5 can fit - but now that we can design rovers, I'm sure you could design your own rover that will fit the bill.

http://www./download/m358c5fb269nyh4/CygnusBase.craft
